entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
